title: Service disruption at Bukit Panjang Station due to technical fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因技术故障导致武吉班让站服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Stesen Bukit Panjang kerana masalah teknikal
title_translations.ta: தொழில்நுட்பக் கோளாறு காரணமாக புக்கிட் பாங் நிலையத்தில் சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: Due to a technical fault which will only be resolved after operational hrs, only one platform of Bkt Panjang Stn will be in svc today. This will result in a longer frequency of btwn 3.5 & 4 mins for peak hrs & 5.5 mins for off-peak on the DTL. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

Due to a technical fault which will only be resolved after operational hours, only one platform of the Bukit Panjang Stn will be in service today. This will result in a longer frequency of btwn 3.5 and 4 mins today on the DTL. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
